specials.name: Abyssal Plague
specials.description: (disease) A creature can’t recover from drained until abyssal plague is cured. Saving Throw DC 28 Fortitude; Stage 1 Drained 1 (1 day); Stage 2 Drained increases by 2 (1 day)

specials.name: Change Shape (A)
specials.description: The green hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female humanoid. This doesn’t change her Speed or her attack and damage bonuses with her Strikes, but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

specials.name: Spell Ambush
specials.description: A creature flat-footed to the green hag takes a –2 circumstance penalty to checks and DCs to defend against her spells.

strikes.name: jaws
strikes.damage: 2d8+8 piercing plus 1d6 evil and Abyssal plague
